thread.title: The journey of a botany professor
thread.title_full: The journey of a botany professor - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: The journey of a botany professor
text:
Gardhava Purana is written and directed by ANR Jadhav, while the cast includes Shrishaila Paramashetti, Eshwar Bindu and Chinnu Prakash.The Gardhabha Purana is a theatrical version of BGL Swamy's novel 'Hasiru Honnu'.
BGL Swamy, head of botany department, goes for a study tour every year. Since the tour expenditure was increasing year by year, the principal suggests he buy donkeys instead of hiring people to carry the collected plants and to make sure to follow government procedures while buying them. The difficulties they come across while buying donkeys is comically depicted in this drama.
Gardhava Purana is written and directed by ANR Jadhav, while the cast includes Shrishaila Paramashetti, Eshwar Bindu and Chinnu Prakash.
The play is scheduled to be staged on October 6 (7.30 pm) at Ranga Shankara,
36/2 8th Cross II Phase, JP Nagar.
